title: What Time Does On Call Release on Prime Video?
description: Fans are eagerly anticipating the release date and time of On Call on Prime Video, a gripping series about a rookie officer and a veteran cop navigating ethical dilemmas in Long Beach, California. With the new season approaching, viewers are keen to learn about the release date, time, episode count, and storyline details. Here are […] The post What Time Does On Call Release on Prime Video? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Discover the release time and episode count of the highly anticipated action-drama series, On Call, coming soon to Prime Video.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Fans are eagerly anticipating the release date and time of On Call on Prime Video, a gripping series about a rookie officer and a veteran cop navigating ethical dilemmas in Long Beach, California. With the new season approaching, viewers are keen to learn about the release date, time, episode count, and storyline details. Here are the latest updates on the release date and time for when On Call will be available to watch. When will On Call come out on Prime Video? Prime Video will release the action-drama series On Call on January 9, 2025, at 12 a.m. PT. On Call is an exciting new original series from Prime Video, launching Thursday night. This highly anticipated season features eight captivating episodes that delve into thrilling law enforcement narratives. Mark your calendars for January 9, 2025, when all episodes will be released simultaneously. Each episode runs for approximately 24 minutes, providing fans with an immersive experience filled with police drama captured through bodycam and dashcam footage. What is Prime Video’s On Call about? On Call is a gripping American police procedural that follows the journey of two police officers. It explores how Traci Harmon, a veteran training officer from the Long Beach Police Department, and her rookie partner, Alex Diaz, work together. The duo tackles emergency calls across California and grapples with the emotional aftermath of losing a fellow officer. The series highlights the complex realities of police work and its impact on humanity, showcasing the contrasting perspectives between a seasoned professional and an optimistic trainee. Check Out the Entire Release Schedule for On Call Below: Episode 1: “Pilot” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 2: “Laws of the Universe” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 3: “South of Heaven” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 4: “Unsung” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 5: “Not Your Savior” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 6: “L.A. Woman” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 7: “War Machine” (Airs on January 9, 2025) Episode 8: “How the West Was Won” (Airs on January 9, 2025) The cast of On Call features an impressive lineup of actors, including Troian Bellisario as Officer Traci Harmon, Brandon Larracuente as Officer Alex Diaz, Eriq LaSalle as Sergeant Lasman, Lori Loughlin as Lieutenant Bishop, and Rich Ting as Sergeant Koyama. Don’t miss out on this gripping police drama — subscribe to Prime Video and stream all episodes starting Thursday, January 9, 2025.
html:
Fans are eagerly anticipating the release date and time of On Call on Prime Video, a gripping series about a rookie officer and a veteran cop navigating ethical dilemmas in Long Beach, California. With the new season approaching, viewers are keen to learn about the release date, time, episode count, and storyline details.

Here are the latest updates on the release date and time for when On Call will be available to watch.

When will On Call come out on Prime Video?

Prime Video will release the action-drama series On Call on January 9, 2025, at 12 a.m. PT.

On Call is an exciting new original series from Prime Video, launching Thursday night. This highly anticipated season features eight captivating episodes that delve into thrilling law enforcement narratives.

Mark your calendars for January 9, 2025, when all episodes will be released simultaneously. Each episode runs for approximately 24 minutes, providing fans with an immersive experience filled with police drama captured through bodycam and dashcam footage.

What is Prime Video’s On Call about?

On Call is a gripping American police procedural that follows the journey of two police officers. It explores how Traci Harmon, a veteran training officer from the Long Beach Police Department, and her rookie partner, Alex Diaz, work together.

The duo tackles emergency calls across California and grapples with the emotional aftermath of losing a fellow officer. The series highlights the complex realities of police work and its impact on humanity, showcasing the contrasting perspectives between a seasoned professional and an optimistic trainee.

Check Out the Entire Release Schedule for On Call Below:

  • Episode 1: “Pilot” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 2: “Laws of the Universe” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 3: “South of Heaven” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 4: “Unsung” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 5: “Not Your Savior” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 6: “L.A. Woman” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 7: “War Machine” (Airs on January 9, 2025)
  • Episode 8: “How the West Was Won” (Airs on January 9, 2025)

The cast of On Call features an impressive lineup of actors, including Troian Bellisario as Officer Traci Harmon, Brandon Larracuente as Officer Alex Diaz, Eriq LaSalle as Sergeant Lasman, Lori Loughlin as Lieutenant Bishop, and Rich Ting as Sergeant Koyama.

Don’t miss out on this gripping police drama — subscribe to Prime Video and stream all episodes starting Thursday, January 9, 2025.
